actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Energy Department; Transportation Department; OMB.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that a current connection with the railroad industry is not lost by reason of certain employment with the Department of Energy.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that a current connection with the railroad industry is not lost by reason of certain employment with the Department of Energy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that a current connection with the railroad industry is not lost by reason of certain employment with the Department of Energy.
